description: A vulnerability was found in VictorFerraresi pokemon-database-php. It has been declared as critical. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality. The manipulation leads to sql injection. The patch is named dd0e1e6cdf648d6a3deff441f515bcb1d7573d68. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-218455.
